# vImage.ReflectionAxis.vertical

**Case**

Reflect the image vertically across the center horizontal line.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.ReflectionAxis.horizontal**: Reflect the image horizontally across the center vertical line.
